attributes.action: Reduce the International Student Tuition fee.
attributes.additional_details: Due to pandemic, everyone are struggling on economy. On this tough time if government of UK thinks charging the huge tons of money to International Student. It really makes the doubt on what UK stands for economy or humanity. In addition, minimum excess to University life and resources, and with just online classes charging huge sum is unfair on the International Students.These students came to UK for best on education culture, not just for University to rob their money.
attributes.background: Parliament must reduce the tuition fee of International students.Currently, International Student pay around £11000-£50,000 per academic year to University. Just about 25-30% reduction onfee can really help international student.As students considered the struggle,government should also help them.

rejection.details:
Fees for international students are set by individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
